com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks
Interface IHoldPresentationStream

public interface IHoldPresentationStream

A class implements IHoldPresentationStream to indicate that it can hold a ByteArrayInputStream object.

See Also:
INeedObjectWithPresentationStream

Method Summary
 ByteArrayInputStream getPresentationStream(String presentationName)
          Returns the ByteArrayInputStream that this object holds.
 void setPresentationStream(ByteArrayInputStream newStream)
          Sets the ByteArrayInputStream that this object holds.
 

Method Detail

getPresentationStream

public ByteArrayInputStream getPresentationStream(String presentationName)
Returns the ByteArrayInputStream that this object holds.

Parameters:
presentationName - the presentation name used to locate the presentation stream.
Returns:
The ByteArrayInputStream, null if an error has occurred.

A given XML presentation stream file has the same name as the corresponding presentationName value passed to the CreatePageGroupCommand object. This method uses the presentation name to locate and read the XML presentation stream, then creates a ByteArrayInputStream to return to the caller

.

setPresentationStream

public void setPresentationStream(ByteArrayInputStream newStream)
Sets the ByteArrayInputStream that this object holds.

Parameters:
newStream - specifies the new ByteArrayInputStream to hold.
